cast.overview: Loosely based on the criminal career of Frank Lucas, a gangster from La Grange, North Carolina, who smuggled heroin into the United States on American service planes returning from the Vietnam War, before being detained by a task force led by Newark Detective Richie Roberts.
cast.title: American Gangster

details.biography: Kelvin Hale is an American actor born in Brooklyn, New York, United States. He fought as an amateur boxer from 1989-1995 and as a professional boxer from 1997-2006. You can see him in some of his previous works, Orange is the New Black, Monster, Living with Yourself on Netflix and the original Power series on the Starz network. Stay tuned for the upcoming FX series, American Sports Story: Gladiator, that is scheduled to be released mid to late 2024.
details.name: Kelvin Hale
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
